# ExcelRound

You probably shouldn't use this unless you need to replicate something done in Excel.

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("mps9506/ExcelRound")
```

```{r}
# IEEE / IEC rounding: -2  0  0  2  2  4  4
round(.5 + -2:4)
```


```{r}
library(ExcelRound)
## Expect -2 -1 1 2 3 4 5
xl_round(.5 + -2:4)
```
